metadata.Title: CVE-2020-29600 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
In AWStats through 7.7, cgi-bin/awstats.pl?config= accepts an absolute pathname, even though it was intended to only read a file in the /etc/awstats/awstats.conf format. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2017-1000501.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-29600` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

awstats - 7.8-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> fix is incomplete, see CVE-2020-35176

criterions.comment: awstats package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.8-1').
